hints.content:
The $\purple{\text{hospital}}$ is $8$ units from the $\pink{\text{school}}$.

![](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/6e8bda3c3126398aa1cb1539479969cdf5c46acd)

So, the $\green{\text{ice cream shop}}$ will be $\dfrac{8}{2} = 4$ units away from both the $\pink{\text{school}}$ and $\purple{\text{hospital}}$.  

![](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/03a3f753f6b038e78f45dac9387405003d69024a)
Mei should graph the ice cream shop at coordinates $(6,-4)$.

Paulo should graph Sean's house at coordinates $(-5,1)$.

question.content:
Paulo graphed the locations of several places in his town on the coordinate plane shown below.  Paulo's best friend, Sean, lives halfway between the courthouse and library.

**At what coordinates should Paulo graph Sean's house?**  
 $($[[☃ input-number 1]]$,\,$[[☃ input-number 2]]$)$



![](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/f4039a03e53c13c9802d9f68482a0a23b6d73954)

hints.content:
$\purple{\text{Band}}$ is $12$ units from $\pink{\text{history}}$.

![](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/881279f591bb628182db87d965abd39e49c98156)

So, $\green{\text{Greg's homeroom}}$ will be $\dfrac{12}{2} = 6$ units away from both $\purple{\text{band}}$ and $\pink{\text{history}}$.  

![](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/2788f543c2b4e1fc433648486bfe4008ef505bcf)
Greg should graph his homeroom at coordinates $(5,-2)$.

choices.content: In a city with an elevation of $6 \text{ km}$ *below* sea level, the temperature was $5 ^{\circ}\text{C}$ *below* zero.
In a city with an elevation of $6 \text{ km}$ *above* sea level, the temperature was $5 ^{\circ}\text{C}$ *below* zero.
In a city with an elevation of $6 \text{ km}$ *below* sea level, the temperature was $5 ^{\circ}\text{C}$ *above* zero.
In a city with an elevation of $6 \text{ km}$ *above* sea level, the temperature was $5 ^{\circ}\text{C}$ *above* zero.

$\purple{\text{Science}}$ is $6$ units from $\pink{\text{art}}$.

![](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/6ca58071b3b52ee69fde23b497c10ce9b4b1cbe2)

So, $\green{\text{Spanish club}}$ will be $\dfrac{6}{2} = 3$ units away from both $\purple{\text{science}}$ and $\pink{\text{art}}$.  

![](web+graphie://ka-perseus-graphie.s3.amazonaws.com/ef3560ea1a5885ac99bc16f79443f930ec6aadd7)
